RelatedSentence: Monday 2.15 pm : Police are appealing for help to track down a missing man , believed to be in the Peterborough area .

Thames Valley Police are trying to locate a 43 - year Andrew Lever - better known as Andy - reported missing on Saturday , May 17 from Portway , Banbury and believed to have travelled to the Cambridgeshire area .
He was last seen by family on the evening of Saturday 17 May and is thought to have driven to the Cambridgeshire area in his blue Ford Ka , with a registration plate beginning BW03 .
He may have been headed towards the Chatteris , or Peterborough area of Cambridgeshire .
He has two tattoos , a Japanese symbol on one arm and black and red design on the other .
He was last seen wearing a grey t - shirt and black three - quarter length jeans .
Police are concerned for his welfare due to his state of mind when he went missing .

If you have any information that can assist police to locate this missing person , please call the 24 - hour non-emergency number 101 and ask to speak to Det Insp Claire Thorngate of Thames Valley Police , quoting URN 1894 17/5 .
